title: Set up continuous integration and deployment for SafeSpaceConversationSimulator
description:
Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the SafeSpaceConversationSimulator application. The pipeline should include the following stages:

1. Code checkout and build
2. Unit and integration testing
3. Static code analysis (using tools like SonarQube or CodeClimate)
4. Security scanning (using tools like OWASP ZAP, Snyk, or Veracode)
5. Performance testing (using tools like JMeter or LoadRunner)
6. Deployment to staging environment
7. Smoke testing in staging
8. Deployment to production environment
9. Notification of deployment status via email or Slack
10. Automated rollback mechanism in case of failure during deployment

The pipeline should be configured to automatically trigger on code commits to the main branch and also support manual triggers for deploying specific versions to staging or production environments.

title: Create testing strategy and test cases for SafeSpaceConversationSimulator
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and write test cases for different components and scenarios of the SafeSpaceConversationSimulator, including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and performance tests. Testing should cover aspects such as the VR environment, user interactions, feedback mechanisms, data storage, accessibility, edge cases, error handling, and security. Suggest improvements in testing strategies where necessary and ensure thorough documentation.

title: Write user documentation
description: Create user guides, tutorials, and other documentation to help users effectively use the SafeSpaceConversationSimulator.
